sn12.10:3.1: 10. Gotamasutta
sn12.10:4.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.10:4.2: ‘kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.10:4.3: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
sn12.10:4.4: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
sn12.10:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
sn12.10:5.3: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:5.4: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
sn12.10:6.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jāti hoti … pe …
sn12.10:6.12: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:6.13: ‘avijjāya kho sati saṅkhārā honti, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti.
sn12.10:7.4: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
sn12.10:8.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti?
sn12.10:8.3: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:8.4: ‘jātiyā kho asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti.
sn12.10:9.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti … pe …
sn12.10:9.11: saṅkhārā na honti, kissa nirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti?
sn12.10:9.12: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.10:9.13: ‘avijjāya kho asati saṅkhārā na honti, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti.
sn12.10:10.4: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
